Recensioner.text: New next-door neighbour
Good personal

Good service from the staff on the farm and in the shop. Since I'm the world's worst carpenter, I'm in dire need of some help getting hold of the right stuff, I get that here.
Has even got help to saw "planks" and moldings so they fit into the car. Tried other building markets but now decided that this is "my" building market.

Good help and advice from knowledgeable staff. Okay prices and they offer very good coffee. Nice visit and good treatment. Definitely worth it if you ask me. Quality of the products and easy to find. Very satisfied with my visit.
Such professional staff! Good selection.
Reasonably priced, good staff, gots what you need without leaving the islands.

As usual a great service; although a new check out system doesn't seem to cater (yet?) for those of us without a Swedish person number.
Sad how some IT professionals give the rest of us a bad rep.
Nice place and nice personal
Very good quality and fair price. Not much choice though.
They are really helpful
Better service the expected. They took care of my old construction materials.
Got lifting help and loading help with heavy door

Had a troublesome case regarding a side light. After some pleasant discussions back and forth, Joakim B at Xl-Bygg V√§llingby resolved everything so that everything went right and we got a new side light ordered. Will update with picture when it is mounted.
Fantastic staff. Committed, knowledgeable, pleasant and service-minded. Solves problems. Recommend Xl-Bygg Faringe
Very crowded when you come with a lorry to unload, you have to back out of the whole place

Great assortment of stuff for your home building projects, with reasonable prices. I read lots of reviews commending the staff. Noone to be found when I was there so I cannot say anything about it myself, but I found what I was looking for anyway so that's OK.
Great staff. Really professional and welcoming. Would have given 5 stars but it‚Äôs a bit pricey when compared to competitors.
Easily the best place to go if you need help with your home project.
Knowledgeable staff, good opening hours, quick deliveries.
Very good advices from the stuff.

We visited the place with a vw polo to buy 4.8m planks-the plan was to cut them to size at the place in the parking lot as i usually need to do if i buy something too big with this midget car. :D
Surprisingly this place have a cutting station right at the entry-nothing fancy, but it has a roof, and a lot of space for long stuff to cut. as bonus, there was no mosquitoes as we have at home where i need to cut otherwise. :D cutting here was a big upgrade compared to other places, so i guess i will be back if i need to do something like this again.
Only minus that they had only 4.5 long planks where they should have 4.8 size by the markings, (probably 4.8 went out and they filled up with a wrong size) what we generally aimed for to cut to 1.2 pieces. Bringing a measuring tape with you is a good idea anyways to doublecheck they what you need anywhere.

Awful experience!
I‚Äôm hugely disappointed with the online shopping experience at Byggmax. Among other things, I‚Äôve ordered 14 plasterboards of the 1200x2500 size to be delivered home. A few days before the planned delivery, I got notified that those plasterboards were out of stock, despite a much bigger quantity being available in the system when I placed the order. That was annoying enough, as I specifically chose to have home delivery, so I wouldn‚Äôt have to rent a trailer and deal with it myself. Other things that I ordered didn‚Äôt have the right quantity and were damaged during transport. Luckily, that issue was promptly dealt with. However, it is 3 weeks after I got the notification about the 14 plasterboards being out of stock (2 weeks after the delivery) and I still haven‚Äôt received my money back! This is absolutely unacceptable. Complete disorganisation and lack of respect for the customers. Do not shop in Byggmax!

Absolutely horrified by their customer support. They have replaced phone based customer support with emails/chat. Only problem they don't respond.  I have waited 4 days now on a response to understand why my order was incorrectly cancelled. Please chose another supplier.
Smooth to load wood due to the big loading areas outside. Otherwise inside, this is not a store like Bauhaus L√§nna which has more to offer. But maybe a bit cheaper.

It's a low-cost kind of construction materials store. Very little staff and things a bit all over the place. For example, there might be stuff that shows up in their stock, but it's empty on the shelf. Then you need to go in the back and search for it by yourself. If it's on a higher shelf, then you need to get an employee to bring it down with a forklift. Cheap, but messy.
Service beyond the ordinary. Remember that you arrive late, when they have closed, but since they were still there, they helped me with a small purchase anyway. Weekend saved. Top class.

XL Bygg Lebe Byggvaror AB is growing like crazy. There is more and more space here for displaying the range. Only quality is sold here and it costs accordingly. The staff is, as I perceive it, a happy bunch.

Started shopping here when it was just called Lebe. Have always received good service from knowledgeable and service-minded staff. The prices might be a bit higher, but the quality is really good. Here you can find everything you need in building materials. It seems to be going well for the company, as they have built towards how it was in the happy 80's. They fit really well.

I have to admit that I don't shop here anymore as I have another XL quite close. But I am very well aware that this construction shop works perfectly well and that the staff is very knowledgeable and service-oriented. I of course recommend living in all weathers and don't forget in these times to shop LOCAL. Times are tough for many entrepreneurs.
Do you want a supplier who is committed and brings out what you need quickly and smoothly without lots of stupid questions. Professionals for real!
Friendly and polite staff, high-quality and wide assortment. Photo of used material from XL-Bygg

XL is definitely an ok store if you forgot something to buy and you need some screws or nails immediately. The staff is very friendly as well. For a planned hardware store shopping I prefer to go to one of the bigger and cheaper places though and safe a lot of money.
Excellent service. Could not wish for more. They also order things they have not in standard assortment.
Good service and they have everyting for buiding a house
Great staff! Will go here for anything I need.
If they don‚Äôt have it they can get for you quickly.
Large selection, good prices and friendly staff :-)

Maybe not the cheapest store, but as far as I know, having shopped at hardware stores all over Sweden, it is by far the most knowledgeable staff. If there is something to buy, they can arrange it. Also offered to borrow a trailer to avoid the shipping which would be SEK 700 from a supplier 2 miles away. Definitely worth the extra kroner to shop here, since significantly better quality of boards compared to eg Bauhaus and Byggmax which compete in the local area.

Pleasant. However, not the one who helped me with the boards. Woman 60 years old gray hair didn't quite add up for him Laughed and sneered Until I said I got 5a in woodwork at school.
Then he pulled himself together.
Other staff super nice.
Recommend

Liked it. Just think it's strange that not all wooden products have price tags. Which makes it harder to shop and a smaller store than Bauhaus. But have tools from companies like Festool that I like. But high prices for them.
Its big store. You can find anyting you need.
Very lovely staff with great knowledge!
Very good
Great store supply but expensive.
üëç
Not so big like others, but hthey ave all what need for moust constructions

By far the worst service you can get..
Absolutely the worst treatment and it reeked of RACISM. Never again will I set foot with you again and I will terminate my account with you over the phone.
The attitude of the warehouse staff here is beyond criticism. If you think that customers are in the way and a burden, then something has gone wrong in the recruitment.
Do not be welcome as a private person. Is only for companies in T√§by.
Very knowledgeable and service-oriented staff. The staff were professional and made sure we found what to buy, right away.

bygg.F√∂retag: RAO Tak och Bygg AB - Takl√§ggare i Stockholm

Recensioner.text:
Raotak put a new roof on us including chimneys etc. a few years ago
We needed a spare roof accessory which Raotak provided free of charge
Not all roofers who install protective scaffolding are for the boys either
Very satisfied, good service and feedback
S√∂ren Christina
Tyres√∂

I hired Rao Tak och Bygg in the summer of 2021 to redo my roof, replace bricks, cardboard, gutters and paint sheets around the chimney and window frames. Roofers came on time as promised and were ready a week later! Everything was handled professionally and the roof turned out great!
Can warmly recommend roofing work.
Very good work. Accurate and skilled roofers. We are very happy with our new roof!
We are very satisfied with how the assignment was carried out. An extra big thank you for the snow shoveling!
Thanks Raigo and everyone else. Nice work. Good price. Will happily recommend you to others!!!
Happy to help you out! Service ok and decent prices, they have a lot in stock!
Good personal, high quality materials, professional tools!
Always helpful and friendly service, good range of products.
Good but on the expensive side
Great!
Very good professional shop

Very polite employees in principle, as in all Swedish companies. Unloading is fast. They work from 6:30 a.m., as I arrived in the evening, there is a place near the store where you can spend the night.
Very large assortment. So far we have found everything we are looking for. Recommended.
Really good and nice board yard, do most of the shopping there/Uffe
The local board yard/sawmill offers towing for free or delivery for a fee.
The kindest staff in building material sales in Stockholm
good
Thanks so much
Received very professional help and perfect service when I (total amateur) was going to build a trellis. Thanks!
Good service with a nice staff.

I have used their services for repairing the damage caused by a water leakage from the neighbors above. XP Bygg were very responsive and quick with setting up the work. I am very happy with the quality of service and the speed of executing the work. Thank you very much!
I hired xp bygg when doing a total renovation of my bathroom. Very happy with the result.

Work well done, good and quick response to all corrections according to the insurance company's wishes, as well as good contact with the construction manager during and until the work was completed. Based on my experience, I can warmly recommend Xp Bygg.

Very good and serious company. Made our bathroom and handled all aspects gallantly with a very good outcome. Really good service, could use them as a good sounding board and always available for questions and answers. Even such a small detail as a corner molding, they recommended us to change from the color we originally thought, which in retrospect we were very lucky that we did!

In addition to being affordable for the delivery they bring and kept a good pace throughout the build with no delays.

We hired XP Bygg in the total renovation of our turn-of-the-century apartment. The work has been done in a professional manner and the results in the bathroom, WC and kitchen were absolutely fantastic! Everything flowed well according to schedule and they have always been available and answered questions and resolved all requests we have had. We couldn't be happier with the work they did and absolutely recommend XP Bygg to anyone thinking of renovating!
Very helpful staff
Br√§dg√•rd under roof, drive through and shop. You get the best service in construction here. Ewert is king!
New and nice + nice staff
Good service and good tips you can get from the staff
A bit cramped with the car but otherwise (very) good
God
Best üí™
Ok
The car was hit by the truck, the truck driver changed his version the day after the incident. And say the car hit the truck with the driver's door first?

Unfortunately relatively tired. Having a building trade in a municipality that is growing the most in all of Sweden means they have a superb business position. However, uncommitted service/attention inside the store (there are five people sitting behind the counter who are quite uninterested in what you are doing as a customer) Out on the boardwalk it has been ok. Would like to benefit businesses in the municipality, but in this case you get better service on e.g. large chains such as in Arninge. Shame, would be happy to pay extra to get good service locally. However, it must be said that I am unhandy and don't do much myself, which on the other hand might mean even more business opportunities (just like many others in the municipality who get things done but are unhandy).
Good selection of materials
Professional and very nice. A place for professional builders.
Bread farm for professionals and home carpenters who want personal service. Always good treatment!
Got fantastic help from a salesman named Robert Blomk√•l. Highly recommended!
This wood company always helps even if it is not a big purchase and nice, it is very worth it

In connection with window replacement, asbestos remediation was carried out. Then came home to an apartment completely covered in dust, which was most likely from the asbestos as no other work was done that day. Have tried several times to report several problems with the windows, but only receive unpleasant treatment
Professional work done by enthusiastic and friendly staff
Best company wallah
Best in Stockholm

I strongly recommend Qviberg Bygg & Design. I have received very helpful advice and decision-making support in the execution of the bathroom renovation and the repair of a damaged balcony. Especially appreciate the personal, pleasant and proactive dialogue all the way! Will definitely hire again and recommend to friends and acquaintances!

I can really recommend Qviberg Bygg & Design. They have been thorough, come up with creative suggestions and have also been very pleasant to deal with. The competence and attention of the project management has been a security throughout the entire renovation.
Daniel and his team have done an excellent job and I am very satisfied. The design and installation work has been excellent. The entire team has proven to be very professional and pleasant.
Professional and serious company with good contacts. Very accommodating and solution-oriented. A company you can trust.

Really professional carpentry company that we have hired several times over the course of about 10 years and have also recommended to many friends and acquaintances over the years. Daniel Qviberg really does a great job as project manager at the company. He is responsive and has a good ability to both listen to requests and come up with suggestions on how he thinks we can achieve the best results in terms of budget. The carpenter Kenneth has worked there all 10 years and is great to have with us.

Qviberg Bygg is not the cheapest, which is not their ambition either. However, they are professionals, show up on time, do what they have to do and tune in, ask questions and come up with suggestions for solutions when needed.

I recommend them for both large and small projects. We have hired them for the complete renovation of an apartment, stairwell carpentry, site-built carpentry, carpentry of a contemporary chest panel, tiling in the hall, as well as ordinary interior carpentry. Rigging and construction of roofs and walls etc. The company really shines when it comes to fine joinery and finishes. The carpenters have been super professional throughout, but radiated genuine job satisfaction during these fine carpentry works.

We had a leakage in our kitchen and we got recommended from a friend to contact provvs. We are very satisfied with the work done by provvs. Hossein who was here was professional, responsive, pleasant and efficient. Thanks for a job well done!

Had a problem with unbalanced heat in the house. Tobias was able to solve the problem
via FaceTime in less than an hour. Will happily recommend ProVVS!!!

They came and installed a bathtub for us and they are awesome! Responsive, responsive, and very helpful. They helped us decide on the type of bath we need need to buy, coordinated and answered all of our questions, and installed the bath on the day planned keeping everything clear and tidy. Would highly recommend them!

Extremly professional, responsive, good quality and value. They are honest and trustworthy and you feel they listen to you and want to provide the very best solution to your need. I am a recurrent customer of Provvs and would gladly recommend them for any pipe related work and bathroom/kitchen renovation.
Tobias was on time, knowledgeable, honest and professional. Fantastic experience! Great service! I was very happy with the quick response, the job that was performed, and the price was reasonable!

vvs.F√∂retag: T√§by VVS- R√∂rmokare-V√§rmepump. Skandinaviska VVS Gruppen

Recensioner.text: Ordered a product from their online store, had som issues with delivery due to issues with their logistics partner, to ensure delivery one of their guys came by my home and hand delivered the product, first class service.

My house pre warmer system didn't  work  and some companies  came  here but they  couldn't  repair  it. I found  VVS gruppem AB on the internet.  They came on time and  solved my warmer system's problem with minimum  price and  the best  quality.  i am very happy  and for the future  if i contact  to any problem about  my  house,  definitely i will  contact  to them because  they are multi tasking .I recommend  this  company  to everybody  who  would  like to do any building  jobs .

Super staisfy to have the guy from this company to fix whole warming system in out house.

We had a trobble issue with all elements in our house due to bad work from another company who did the ronovation on our property. We were basically lost whole water circulation in the elements and noone could find the rootcause. We asked a few company to come over and have a look, all of them were not able to even find the cause.

Anyhow, just wanted to share my experience with this company and I personally recommend them to you if you have any water/warming problem at your house.
Fast to respond and highly professional. I will definitely be a returning customer.
They are professional and their price is reasonable. Recommended.

Old hard stuff but very well performed.
We like people that are nice, work hard and do a good job. :)
/Rikard ¬§ kind regards
Top service and fast to help out. //Susanna

Today on 20240806 we had plumbing repair I had noted the following;
*Very knowledgeable staff and explained all work through drawings! Before they start..
* Very Unusually honest!! They said that work is not necessary even though they lose almost all the work and pay.?
* Very nice and well done cleaning work and leaving the place very clean and nice..
* Explained all the work and materials that come in the invoice and offer payment up to 30 days.. offer fast heat pump service..
I strongly recommend them..
I had seen many companies.. but never experienced such on my honor and conscience I swear ..
Recommended! Very happy with the job they did in my bathroom. Got a clear quote up front and no surprise costs were added.

Got help changing a kitchen faucet in June. Very pleasant treatment in all contact. Very good job and pleasant reception during the installation. Fixed what was needed so it was the best.  Helpful with split invoice as the company I was going to advertise the previous faucet to required a split invoice.
Cleaned up after himself.
Can really recommend this company.

Called Philip late Wednesday evening after damage to toilet causing water to just squirt out. Philip helped over the phone and squeezed in help the following day, Thursday, with replacing the entire toilet seat. Extremely helpful, knowledgeable and professional on all levels. Many thanks! Regards William
We were helped to change the faucet in the kitchen. We received very good service and good results on the job!
Can highly recommend! Superb service and nice guy üôè
Nice plumber who did a great job. However, if he had salted the invoice a little, I wouldn't choose him again :-(
A serious company that has very good solutions, has cooperated with them for 5 years and is always happy to use them as subcontractors.
Quality work and fast service
Replacement of dripping ballofix, everything went smoothly. Nice woman on the phone and competent plumbing guys
We are very satisfied with the work that Nero VS and R√∂r AB have done for us. Pleasant and cooperative staff! They did plumbing throughout our garage.
Great sense of service - no problems. Wasn't late and fixed original problems as well as other things I pointed out. Easy to have and do with.
Can highly recommend Nero vvs. Problem solvers, nice, responsive...we will use them again of course.

Exceptional service, 100% recommend. I had power out issue in my apartment. I spoke to Daniel and he helped me fix the problem by myself instead of selling me the service. He guided me all throughout the process and saved me thousands of sek.
Really helpful, super nice and friendly and fixed our problem over the phone! Big thumbs up.
Serious company. Advised against ordering on call from them and instead guided how to resolve the issue, much appreciated.
Very fast, clear and helpful! Spoke to a person who was able to give me quick advice directly over the phone. 100% the first I call if I ever need help again. Many thanks for the help!

Visited Skylten's Escape room with two students. Impressed by Skylten's Escape room with errors from reality.
After a day with the Sign, you understand what knowledge he has and he succeeds in conveying this to the students and me in an interesting way as he weaves in the story behind the errors.
You couldn't feel more welcome at Escape room when H√•kan Svanstr√∂m receives us with his hospitality and does everything to ensure that everyone gets something out of the day.
The day is topped off by Lasagne @H√•kan's wife!

Can highly recommend a visit!

"Thank you Ashot, so much for your prompt and professional service! I really appreciate you coming out so quickly to fix my wash-basin. Your expertise and efficiency have saved me from a lot of stress and potential damage. Please know that your hard work and dedication are valued and recognized. I'll definitely recommend you to friends and family!"
Very quick and professional service. Great communication, and had my issue resolved within 24 hours.
It was great job and effort, a very nice genlteman
Quick and fast service, couldnt have asked for a better experience highly recommend!
Best service and good work

Incredibly accommodating in case of problems with the dishwasher that did not take in water. After 2 weeks of waiting where the manufacturer didn't have time to come and when they came they couldn't fix the problem, I got contact and help the same day. Nice staff, and very service minded. Now temporarily fixed, the machine can be used and a spare part ordered. Very pleased!!!
Got in touch quickly and within a short time I received 2 interesting offers. Positive feeling.
professional and pleasant.
Superior!

Sohaib helped us change the geothermal heat pump and it went very smoothly and professionally. Always punctual and careful to communicate what is happening. I can really recommend Sohaib with colleagues!

Sohaib quickly presented a technically sound solution to our request for replacing a heat pump in a villa. The implementation was smooth and professional and took about two days (heat pump + FTX). The end result met our expectations with flying colours. Stylish and smart piping and a good overview of the system. Highly recommend him!

Absolutely the best service! Very pleased! All the heating broken Saturday - brand new heating system installed Tuesday. Fast and reliable service, pleasant treatment and fast communication. I can really recommend Sohaib and his colleagues.

A plumbing company that has a high level of service, listens to challenges and arranges the problems with accuracy and quality. Recommended to several friends because they are the best I've tried on Liding√∂.

Distinctive for Stockholms R√∂r & VVS AB turns out to be that they have a hard-to-beat combination of qualities that only thoroughbred professionals possess. Professional, committed, reliable, accommodating, punctual and quick to action. All problems with plumbing in my kitchen and bathroom (where several other plumbers have gone wrong) are finally identified and solved! Plus, changing the sink in the bathroom went like clockwork, it fits like a charm exactly in the right place. I call that finlir. What more could you ask for?
Have used Falk & Bj√∂rn a few times. Can highly recommend. Very good service, reliable and affordable. Very happy with completed work as well.

Always so professional and best service. Knowledgeable and skilled plumbers.
They are punctual and thorough in their work.
In incredibly good

STAY AWAY! They came in early August to install a washing machine in my kitchen. They forgot to remove the transit bolts from the machine (see picture) or did it on purpose and did not inform me about it. These bolts are used to stop the drum unit inside from moving during transportation. A professional should know about this...

When I switched on the machine, the strong vibrations broke the support they had built to fit the machine in the kitchen cabinet, that was not good in the first place.

I then had to disconnect the pipes, remove the machine from the cabinet, open it up, remove the transit bolts, build a better support and put everything back in place. Luckily my dad was around to help.

When I complained about the quality of the work done I received no answer. Then, almost two months after, I received an invoice for more than 5.000 SEK. I questioned the amount and their answer was that the only thing they had to take care of was the water connection. This is a lie, I asked them to take care of everything needed to fit the washing machine in the kitchen. In any case, since they did more than just connecting the water pipes, they should be accountable for the way this was done.

Bottom line: worst customer service ever and dangerous way of working. If I hadn't realised those bolts were still in place, I would have damaged the machine and the kitchen furniture.

I know finding someone to help with handy work in Stockholm is hard but my strong suggestion is to look elsewhere.

Unfortunately, the work was never carried out. The first time the technician was sick and the second time he never showed up?? Although the work was never done, an invoice arrived in the mailbox, it was later canceled when I called the administration. A bit of a mess but nothing more than that.
The guys came as it was said, Very good "pull", I'm COMPLETELY SATISFIED. Recommended.üëçüëç
Very good job. Fast and efficient. Will call them every time I get frostbite‚Ä¶
Both the plumber and the electrician came on time and did a great job.
Bra service
Very knowledgeable and good service!

Supermarkets in all their glory and depressed prices on the same range, but if you live in a house from the 50s and have new plumbing from the late 70s, the possibilities of finding travel parts when needed are minimal.
Then R√∂rdoktorn is invaluable and it is not a disadvantage that they have good service as well.
Then of course it's a bit more expensive, but you save a lot just by maintaining it rather than replacing it with a more modern one because the parts are no longer cool enough.
Felt like it was very helpful and knowledgeable staff.
Knowledgeable, pleasant, listens and solves all questions
First-class service from the first call until the new toilet was in place. Without doubt among the better service I have experienced with quote and everything!

Can warmly recommend S√∂derorts VVS and Bygg. Very pleasant and clear communication and I am completely satisfied with the job done (uninstalling the food grinder and help with the blender that was loose). No problems with quotes and invoices. Will hire them again if needed!

Such incredibly good service as well as doing his job carefully helped me change the toilet and faucet!

Really recommend this company for people who want everything carefully and well!
Got quick help with pipes that were leaking after changing the toilet seat and mixer. They arrived the next day and at a reasonable price too. Very nice treatment. Highly recommended!
Good and fast service, we are very satisfied with the work! Pleasant treatment and no problems with the invoice. Recommend!

Here you can find spare parts and accessories for bathrooms in very many different variants.

Helpful and skilled staff is ready to help one to find the right product in the store.

The only thing is that it is a very expensive store. I don‚Äôt know why, but the same spare parts were almost 30% more than their competitors.
Really nice owners really customers minded and helpful, I can only recommend!

You always have to form your own opinion, but I don't think I've ever seen a store with so many dissatisfied customers or low ratings, and the answers from the store to the dissatisfied are of the type "they are as they are" boring but you can go somewhere else simply stop

DOES NOT OFFER OPEN PURCHASE
Sad treatment and no understanding of wrong purchase. Was in the store 5 minutes(!) ago and bought an item that it turns out I didn't need. Went back and wanted to return it right away, but it was absolutely impossible. Absolutely impossible. I was offered a credit receipt instead? Like I would shop there again, not a chance. Also, double the price of any other store - do not recommend this store. Unfortunately.
Professional very knowledgeable staff, answers, explains patiently. Friendly reception. A skill that is hard to find. Highly recommended.
Knowledgable, pleasant and service minded. Really recommended!
Best plumber. Lars is knowledgeable and thorough, also very pleasant and service-minded. Really recommended!
Very good! Service oriented and knowledgeable!

Very professional with a pleasant reception.
Lars has very high social skills and is very responsive.
The work was perfect and he was very meticulous.
Now I know who to call if I have problems in the future.
A positive professional plumber who sees what needs fixing and solves it efficiently. Can be highly recommended.
Great service and very professional! Came and fixed my broken heater 20 min after my call to them!

I felt taken care of from the first contact with the receptionists in the company!
Happy, helpful and competent.
Repairers/Installers were professional, competent, service-oriented and quality conscious.
Thank you for a fantastic job done with us! I will definitely hire you in the future and recommend you to others.
Sincerely
Loay from Kolmilan

Very professional. Have had problems with my heat pump, had other companies here that failed. Have now received help from VVS Energiservice on two separate occasions and everything just works. They have technicians who know what they are doing and are not just guessing. A clear 5th.

We installed a new air/water heat pump in the spring of 2022.
Received a quick response to the quote that contained everything we wanted.
The work started according to plan and ended according to plan. What was offered also became what was invoiced.
The installers were thorough and responsive. We are very happy with the end result, and not to mention the reduced consumption.

If you could give a minus, they would get it.

Sweden's by far the worst plumbing company, lacks competence, no internal communication, damages the house and does not want to compensate for the damage they themselves created, takes an extremely long time for installation than promised, uses rags and no wet vacuum when they empty the water heater in a room without a floor drain (the answer you get is "this is how we work") invents new extra costs, cannot carry out work that they themselves offer for, charges really well for materials (had to pay SEK 14,000 for 5m of pipe and 2 couplings).

Authorized nibe installer?! Forget it! They don't know a thing about the stuff they install.

You should beware of this rogue company!
Pay a little extra to someone else and you will avoid the above points that I have had to go through.

Didn't respond to your reply, got a reply from your founder Pierre. "You seem to write about people, have a nice day"
Unprofessional at all levels in the organization!

vvs.F√∂retag: VVS & R√∂rmokare i Stockholm - S√§kra R√∂r och Bygg Stockholm AB

Recensioner.text: Stockholm's best pipe cleaner! We hired S√§kra R√∂r for piping in the kitchen as well as changing the mixer and installing ballofix. Super satisfied! Good communication, clear in quotation and worked carefully. It is noticeable that they are passionate about their customers being satisfied, in every situation!

Warn about this company. Then they reported to safe water because they don't want to voluntarily fix the mistakes they made with me. For a new build, they have drawn all the water lines, it's just that the lines that are supposed to be in the ceiling are collapsing down the walls, connections are standing and leaking water at the false ceiling and a lot of other mistakes. Safe water has asked them to contact me to fix but they are not interested

Replacing the mixer.
Quick and easy contact, with a quick quote. Once in place, the drain also needed to be replaced (which I was afraid of). However, the work was done quickly and even with the addition, the final price landed at a reasonable amount, especially considering the quote I received from another company. Very satisfied! 5/5

Jacques who works for S√§kra R√∂r did a professional and perfectly impeccably elegant job installing my washing machine. A high level of technical know-how also permeated the conversations. The treatment also gives great credibility both to the employee and the company as a whole. Feelings of deep joy were the result.

I hired S√§kra R√∂r & Bygg for the installation of a new toilet from K-Rauta. Both Fadi who handled the dialogue and Jacques who installed the toilet handled everything exemplary. Both very nice too. Highly recommended!üòä

Needed to repair toilet seat and bathroom fittings down in the basement of a 3-storey building in Enskede near Skogskyrkog√•rden with the help of knowledgeable plumbing contractor and pipelayer at Bagarmossen VVS & R√∂rmokeri in Stockholm after the toilet seat had leaked, and water came from the mixer in the shower

Fix of blockages in kitchen water lines and the laundry room drain by the plumbing contractor Liljeholmen VVS & R√∂rmokeri in Stockholm to an industrial property in V√§stberga, H√§gersten, a cast iron well that needed to be drilled out, out of the cleaning plug that we couldn't get rid of, and the plumber was able to replace with plastic pipe

The faucets in the bathroom in Sk√∂ndal were broken, water ran and leaked, so the plumbing contractor Farsta VVS & R√∂rmokeri in Stockholm was able to buy new mixers from their wholesaler, install new faucets for the shower, sink and bathtub for the lower floor of the terraced house
A good lunch Thai restaurant. Well tasting lunch meals to reasonable prices.

Very tasty food, I ordered the duck curry bowl, it came with fruits, mild chilly and tasted very good. Cocktails and wine were good as well. Before the main course, we ordered the mix plate which had vegetarian rolls, crispy fried chicken, crispy fried shrimps, and salad in vingar and chilly sauce. We were very satisfied by the food. The atmosphere was nice, toilets clean and neat. Service was good and staff were kind and helpful. I would recommend this place.
Great service and delicious food.  If  you like spicy, you will not be disappointed!

It's above my expectation. First I thought it will be just another overpriced Thai restaurants, but they're not. The price is considerably normal compared to many other thai restaurants, 175sek for a wok risnuddlar with beef. The portion is decent and I get an extra sallad. The taste is good. The interior is green rainforest, it seems small indoor sitting place but I guess they have an innerg√•rd. They have a serious decent bar also.

Fantastic Thai food at reasonable prices. I had the crispy pork with garlic, chili paste and roasted sweet basil. The portion sizes were top notch and the food tasted really good. An extra plus for the atmosphere!

Reasonably priced. 133kr for chicken pad Thai and a soda. Cooked fresh. Decent sized portion. It tasted incredible. Fresh ingredients. Crunchy. Sweet. Absolutely devine. One of the best pad Thais I‚Äôve ever had and I lived in Thailand. It‚Äôs very unassuming from the outside but well worth venturing inside.

A hidden gem. We loved it! Price is good and the quality even better. But the drinks are a lil bit high price (but that‚Äôs everywhere in Stockholm). (when they say it‚Äôs spicy it really is so be careful when choosing what to eat haha) we had number 7 and  number 70 :)

Wow. What a treat - we had fantastic authentic Thai food in this unassuming location. Don‚Äôt let yourself be confused by the naming of Thai Wok and Sushi, which obviously doesn‚Äôt fit together very well. But both ‚Äúdepartments‚Äù are in good hands. They get fresh high-quality salmon from Norway every day and the certified Thai Sushi chef prepares it expertly. On the Thai side, amazing homemade sauces and really good quality. Will happily come back.
Tasty!!! Well balanced and hot is hot üòÅ Sizes of the dishes are big, prices are nice, service is polite, calm and clean place. I highly recommend!

I fail to understand the hype of these comments - to me, this is an ordinary ‚ÄúSwedish Thai‚Äù-spot. Sure, the produce might be good (as you might read in the comments), but I would not satisfy my expectations.

It might be worthwhile for a lunch, but I wouldn‚Äôt travel far.

3/5 shrimps
The food is very tasty, the service is good. good and nice place relatively inexpensive in the center of Stockholm.

Solid thai lunch offering

Not too expensive with outdoor seating and several different dishes to choose from. Got a pork dish with 2 chilis that was just the right amount of spice

Nothing bad to say about this place!

Amazing Authentic Thai restaurant with very friendly staff. The food was great and portions were large for relatively cheap price. I would say the green curry could have been a little less salty but that's a minor detail. The one thing we noticed about the overall atmosphere is the lack of decorations on terrace as well as the missing table setting. This could really improve the overall experience and might even attract more people :)

Great food, big portions, it was very very quiet on a Friday evening, but that's exactly what we wanted. No kids. I think this place gets lots of orders for delivery instead. There was very subtle background music, unobtrusive and pleasant. Two young, friendly ladies serving. They forgot to charge me for my wine. I went up and to pay for it, but instead, they offered it on the house. Very nice of them.

Super delicious!!
Good service & great prices for Stockholm

Walked in without a reservation and was able to get promptly seated for a table of 3. We were recommended to this place by a Thai coworker and she was right. The food was superb and delicious. You could taste the quality in the vegetables, the curry, and the rice. I will definitely dine here again!

Plenty of well prepared authentic dishes, especially the broths of the dishes seen in the pictures were delicious. Everything tasted fresh, well seasoned and the portions were big. The service was really nice too. Overall great experience with Thai food.

The food is tasty.
Excellent customer service.
Comfortable and cozy to eat out with family and friends.

I am in Stockholm for holiday weekend. Then I found this restaurant next to my hotel. I ordered SomTam, and Laabmoo for myself. The quality of meat is very fresh and very tasty. Also excellent service as well. I have to say this restaurant is one of the best Thai restaurant in Europe I ever have. Highly recommend.
Had amazing red steamed Tilapia. Delicious and had heaps of veggies. Plus my mate had beef Penang.

Hidden gem.super delicious.
Cheap also
110kr
we were visiting stockholm and decided to stop by here to eat on our first day. all our questions were answered, we enjoyed our food everything was so delicious!!

Best Thai in whole of Stockholm - regular customer here :)
Prices, quantity and quality are top notch!
Very delicious,Thai food. You have to look for this place to find it. Oddly placed.
Nothing like their outlets in the city.. noodles were just ok . Gul curry with scampi was so spicy . Not a great takeout experience especially when you wanted to have a good Thai food

Me and my boyfriend are Thai food enthusiasts, so we were exited to try Thai food in Sweden.

So many things were wrong with this place. I am not sure if they were racist or had a vendetta against us.

First things first, my boyfriend ordered a meal with no vegetables to which the waiter laughed and commented that his food looked ‚Äúsad and bad‚Äù - very rude.

Secondly, we ordered some water that came in a glass bottle and was supposed to come with glasses to pour and drink with. She did not provide our table with glasses while all the other tables had one.

I ordered pad Thai with an extra fried egg on top. My food did not come with the extra egg and she refused to take it off the bill. Also my pad Thai wasn‚Äôt saucy- it had a lot of oil which lowkey made me feel nauseous.

I highly recommend that no one should come to this restaurant. All the other service I‚Äôve received in Sweden has been top tier expect for this experience.

Avoid at all costs. Don‚Äôt understand the hype of this place but probably something has changed recently. Ordered a Som Tam Thai with a main dish‚Äôs price and got it like a side dish with a mountain of rice aside. Didn‚Äôt go there to eat rice and the Som Tam was way too sweet. They already warned us at the beginning that their card terminal is broken and only accept cash or Swish. Sounds like they are ready to close down soon.

Very pleasantly surprised to find a very authentic rendition of Pad Grapow here - great spices, beautifully cooked pork, topped off with flavourful fried egg. This is the place to come if you need to fulfil your appetite for Thai in Stockholm. The restaurant also has a cosy environment.

If you‚Äôre looking for authentic Thai cuisine, this is the place to be! The flavors are true to traditional Thai cooking‚Äîno imitations here. I‚Äôve noticed some reviews that reflect a lack of understanding or experience with real Thai food, but don‚Äôt be misled. The dishes here are prepared with care, using authentic ingredients, and they deliver the taste of Thailand. Highly recommended for those who appreciate genuine Thai flavors!

Located in the Stockholm centrum, we found this Thai restaurant as we were craving for some Thai dish. I am very thankful for the hospitality that we got in this restaurant. The decoration and the atmosphere was great! The food was also great, the fried rice was better than in most Thai places and the red curry dish was amongst the best. I personally did not enjoy the Pad Thai that much but it was okay.
So so so good! The thai chicken rice was the best and save my Asian‚Äôs belly while travelling to Stockholm. No frills only good and hearty food!

I‚Äôve been a frequent customer as I really like their pad Thai (tbh one of not many dishes that tasted good for me here). So far I‚Äôve liked the place since they have quite democratic pricing. I‚Äôd only consider it for food to go, since the place is super small, no WC, and it‚Äôs super cold (unless it‚Äôs summer). However, today much changed for me since I faced quite a disrespectful situation. It was my first time coming for lunch (which is cheaper than usual), and what I got was obviously a much smaller portion, which they tried to hide (!) by putting 3 big pieces of lemon to fill the space in the box (they normally put one, and the portion fills the whole box). Thus, this ‚Äúlunch offer‚Äù was just a lie. This is not a big deal in terms of money, but a big deal when it comes to how they treat customers.

Great experience!  Was my first time trying this and I kept on wanting more!

Service was so fast and efficient. Location is closed to Odenplan Station. A very convenient place!

Kind of one time visit restaurant. The food is OK and do not have wow factors. Really felt that I was not having authentic Thais cuisine here. My daughter was not liking fried chicken. The place is small and can accommodate 8-10 people and congested sometimes as people come and go. I was having dinner here with my family.

Fantastic Thai food and super low price. It has few seating options but nicely decorated.
Must try if you like Thai food

Comforting Thai food while on holiday.  This place is fantastic- delicious, authentic tasting, Thai food.  The ingredients are so fresh.  Nice break from all the other local restaurants.

Not a restaurant setting, but food is totally worth it.  Definitely recommend it.

Amazing food, big portions full of flavour!! We ordered Glass Noodles Pad thai with chicken, it was a huge portion (fit for two adults) filled with well seasoned veggies and marinated chicken, the Orange chicken was amazing as well. Wait time was 5-10 minutes and the lady was very sweet and helpful.
Overall a gem in the Stockholm city!! The prices are low and affordable (even for turists like us), there a place to sit comfortably.
I highly recommend to visit this place!!

I‚Äôve been all over the world, and this was one of the best Thai feeds I‚Äôve ever had. I found this place online and stopped by with my wife and daughter.

We had the skewers w/ peanut sauce
Chicken and cashews
Red Thai w/ noodles

Free / prawn crackers
Very friendly staff
Can‚Äôt beat it. Must visit when in Stockholm
This place was so good, my family insisted on eating here 2 out of our 3 days in Stockholm! Portions were generous, flavors exceeded expectations, and as others have stated, amazing value.

I loved this place!!!! The ambience was so lovely and the curry was just what I needed on a cold evening. Everyone needs to stop by this cute spot. I loved their yellow curry and spring rolls. A Stockholm must visit!

Great food. We ordered fried fish and tom kha and it is very good. The fried fish is crispy with generous sauce on top of it. The sauce is very nice and refreshing. The tomkha is tasty and the chicken is tender.

Updated:
Have came back multiple times to try different dishes. Highly recommend!  Always consistent in taste of food.
Loved these dishes: Crispy Belly Salad, Pad Thai, Tom Yum Soup
-
Really liked all the dishes ordered, Grilled squid stood out to me the most. Duck was a little bit dry.

Will be back to try other food in the future!

We had a good first experience in this resto. The staff is very friendly and serving mind, she brought the trailer to our table with the different sauces.
We had Grillad anka and beef soup, for 149kr each, both were very tasty, good quality.

I'm thai and have tried many thai restaurangs in Stockholm and this place is my favorite so far. Just a little pricey but you'll get real thai food (very very thai both the taste and ingredients) also kinda big portions. I went there with a thai friend and we ordered 3 dishes but we could eat up only 2 so we took away one. So good, high recommended!

PS. You better book time/table first because it's kinda small place!

We ordered takeout for lunch one day after noticing this place. The location is good since it's so close to the subway station. The entrance is unassuming but the restaurant looks alright. I had the pad thai and my boyfriend had the panang curry. The food was decent and the portions were generous, although the curry was a bit anemic and watery.

Thai House Wok. Your average Thai house wok place that gives you that sweat hot feeling at lunch that we all need. ..and a bag of Samarin before bed. (teeth) The food is average but the portions üç≤üå∂Ô∏èare HUGE! Seriously, I took ‚Äútwo small dishes‚Äù it was two regular sized dishes on a huge plate. I was stuffed and sleept the rest of the day at the office. ..ops delete that. The interior are minimalistic and clean. Reminds me of Japanese restaurants..if someone invites me there so I can check for sure. In all. You will not be disappointed here. And certainly stuffed!

Just another thai place. Nothing wow, nothing fancy, I took shrimps with ginger and vegetables, rice on the side, my sister had green curry with tofu and vegetables and we shared some spring rolls. The food was alright, but it was not hot enough.
We were not served at the table, drinks were not included and their water was warm. People who eat here have unfortunatley not yet found a better thai restaurant which there are several off.
The food was cold on arrival, I asked them to reheat it which they did. Overall nice service.  Too sweet for my taste.

My favorite spot to get Thai. I lived in Thailand and missed the smiles sometimes in Sweden. You can get a smile yo get through a cold winter night and affordable meal too. Friendliest staff! They are happy to make things vegetarian or vegan as needed. Ideal spot for winter days and summer too!
Reasonable price with tasty food. Take away some and enjoy your meal with sunset at the viewpoint nearby!

Cheap Wok kiosk. They have a few seats available so that you can eat there but many did take away when I was there. Tested the egg noodles with chicken. Decent, but way too much sugar in the wok sauce. Next time I will try something else and more spicy. They do have small packages with sambal oelek to heat things up but those were sweet as well. Chili flakes too. Will give them another chance.
Mouth-watering tasty, fresh and low price.. nr 21 on menu called "ostron wok with tiger shrimp" as picture below.
It's my happy lunch place. They have delicious Thai food including vegetarian options.
Pad Thai with three üå∂Ô∏èüå∂Ô∏èüå∂Ô∏è hits the spot!

Our go-to lunch and dinner place. Consistent food quality - I get No 22 Fullmoon Basilica, it is phenomenal! We also get No 23. You can ask for mild version of dishes, they make it nonspicy. Absolutely love people who work there, the food is delicious, nutritious and reasonably priced (especially for lunch: 99 sek special). Servings are generous. Best Thai in town!

Don't be scared away by the looks of the place. The curries here are absolutely delicious, very cheap and you get huge portions. Perfect for take-away. I go several times a week now whenever I am too lazy to cook.

Great place for takeout! Don‚Äôt let the appearance scare you away.
Hearty portions and very delicious food. No place to sit right by restaurant but nice to sit in park nearby or bring home for a tasty bite.

Thai Oasen: ‚ù§Ô∏è  This little streetshop has been on this corner for many decades, It has been the housing for many businesses. And finaly it has found its true purpose. A Thaikitchen. We have tried most of the lunch places now in the area, with various result, this place is among the very top notch! The food is realy good and with ingredients that makes the cut. The hot n spicy is also perfect. But the three things that scores big time are the things that we like the most.

1. Speed! You get your food in a jiffy no matter the que or order!

2. Size! As a grown man you can EASILY! split the lunch with someone or save for the next day. You wont go hungry to the desk. You will sleep on the keyboard...AGAIN!

3. Price! The price is a s we speak 87kr! For a mega portion. And if you are a student its like 55kr(!)

I really recommend this place. Its forth the walk .Try it!! üçú

The food here is amazing! The staff are so friendly and nice, it‚Äôs so nice to sit outside and enjoy the sunshine with a fantastic pad Thai. I love it! You will love it too, trust me on this one guys.
Affordable and generously sized Thai dishes are served here, with the option to make them spicy if desired. They also offer good tofu as part of their local-style menu.

pretty good for what it is!!! not the best thai food in the world but convenience and cuteness made it pretty hard to hate. it was a one man operation when we went and was still very quick and seamless.

Too bad service today. Wont come back, asked for a soda, serwice didnt even listened, took clients that called after I PAID, VERY RUDE, I waited far enough, is the goal to fill the gap of clients that pays, the option.
No thanks ever again, had to scoop my food in hurry because of you, I work night....Coop would be better ...

Chicken tasted bad. I ordered a paneng curry, normally its a thick sause with cocomilk that is orange in colour. This sause was like pure cocomilk with a touch of curry. Padthai not good either. Will never come back

Went to EMERGENCY ROOM because of untrained staff that speaks no European languages whatsoever. Two people checked four times that there are no nuts or tree nuts. They told us no no. My baby was without me for the first time that night. I speak six languages to some degree.
√Ñt inte h√§r om ni har allvarliga allergier!!
Not the best Pad Thai i had, but good for a quick stop if you are just hungry and want for some Thai wok takeaways.

Delicious Tom Kah soup! She made it for me if though it wasn‚Äôt on the menu! Most authentic thai I‚Äôve had outside Thailand 10/10 would come back. Very good value! Need an English menu though my partner ordered the wrong thing because of this. Still good though!

My friend said it was the most delicious Pad Thai she ever had! The Tom Yum is also very delicious! Authentic Thailand cooking

The owner and the cook were very friendly and helpful! We had a chat with the owner :)

Having been to Thailand few times, the food is exactly how one would get in Bangkok. We had a hard time understanding the menu as it was only in Swedish language, we had to use Google translate and we didn't get much help from the staff as well. As there are many tourists visiting Stockholm, it is really good to have an English translated menu.

This was not just the worst wok dish, but the worst meal I've ever had. The chicken was served with all the unpleasant skin still attached, and the dish was made up of mostly inedible chicken parts that should have been discarded. Terrible!
The food is amazing! The prices are very very reasonable.
I expected to see Thai people working in a Thai restaurant. That was not the case and along with the service, maybe explains why the restaurant was totally empty on a Friday night.
Reasonably quick, good sized portions, excellent price, incredible looking presentation and courteous and friendly staff.

Decent stodgy thai with good portion sizes and friendly staff. They have all your favourites freshly cooked to order. There doesn't seem to be a salad bar and you pay for coffee. Seats are plentiful and good for groups.
Three stars for the food because it's decent sizes, tasty, and moderately priced. Staff can be a bit rude. All-in-all, decent place for a quick lunch/dinner or takeaway.

The staff is pretty rude (or at least dismissive and just uninterested in their customers), but the food tastes okay, and you get HUGE portions. I usually bring food with me and then eat it for dinner for the next couple of days or so, so you really get a bang for the buck, especially if you buy the lunch of the day, which is cheaper than everything else.

However, as mentioned, the staff really should be sent away on a customer service boot camp.

Tasty food, clean.

However, no side small dishes, no salad, nothing extra to eat with the food
Great food and good service! You can try a menu with deep fried shrimps. It was tasty!
One of the best Thai in the city. Portions are huge and the cost is very affordable. 5/5

Nice food. Recommended, but only take-away.
Should have eaven lower prices...
Used to be good, but now everything is soaked in oil for some reason.
Very good food and generous portions. Good service and nice atmosphere inside. I'm always happy to come back here, recommended!
Delicious food. Good sized portions. Friendly service. Highly recommended!
Very kind staff as always, providing fresh, quality ingredients and very good music when they're doing hard techno.
Great weekday thai! Red curry was amazing :)
Great food!! I fully recommend it. So far best Thai in town.

Amazing food and friendly staff! They have Pad Kee Mao with wide flat rice noodles (my favorite), which is hard to find at Thai places in Sweden for some reason.

It‚Äôs conveniently located right by an E4 highway exit.

Was quite disappointed because we were hoping to get hotpot but they discontinued it without updating their website. We ordered ala carte which was yummy except that some of the shrimps were undercooked esp one but owner gave us discount. Friendly place. Hopefully, they bring back their hotpot soon and also hopefully they will add more lighting in their resto.

Ordered take-away for me and the family and we all agreed that the food was great. I had the Pad Cha Talay and it was delicious and just the right amount of spicy.

- Online order was prepared swiftly
- Good size portions

I‚Äôm  very disappointed !
I have been in this restaurant few times before and it was ok, not super but ok.
But today.. I have got soup of pad Thai, very cheap nodules, not the flat one. A lot of souce with water.
It was bad !
Very vorn out buldring and inventary but nice hospitality and good food.
The food was delicious, especially Pad Thai. I tried the beer Chang, it was also great. Restaurant personal was really nice.
Very tasty food and very friendly atmosphere. Loved Pad Thai.
One of the best Thai foods I had. Highly recommended.
Fantastic food for cost and superb service and speed will return and test more of the menu. The number 19 and 1 was good could have more penut sauce on the number 19
tasty food
The place was comfy, people very nice and the food absolutely amazing. We have been in Thailand and eating this food was like coming back there. Very delicious

15+ years ago the staff asked if you really wanted to order a dish with 3 chilis on the menu and told you that you'd been warned.  Nowadays it's just what one chili corresponds to in other Thai restaurants.

For some unknown reason I received my entree before my starter.
The laab lacked lemon grass and mint but had a better chilli bite (though no way near what a 3 chili dish would be,  or has been here in the past) than the som tam (also marked with 3 chilis) which only had two deseeded chilis for the entire portion.
Good  flavour profile when it comes to sweet, salty and sour.  Plenty of fresh lime wedges in the som tam.
The rice was bad.  Overcooked and mushy.

Too bad the staff hadn't cleaned the table after previous guests (rice on the tablecloth) and for some reason they cranked up the stereo an hour before closing time when guests were still eating and trying to have conversations.

I won't be back.
It has a very welcoming atmosphere. It is always full of people and the treatment of the workers is very friendly and close: they always welcome you with a smile. The food is very tasty.
A little disappointed about 2 Dishes. A little bit overpriced and little portion.
This took me back to Thailand, amazing taste and big portions! Lovely, would definitely recommend!
